greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of the set of numbers defined in A002977.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = if chi(n) then 1 else 0, where chi(n) = if n<3 then (n=1) else ((n mod 2 = 1) AND chi((n-1)/2)) OR ((n mod 3 = 1) AND chi((n-1)/3)).
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 20 2007
